articles.title: The Biggest Discoveries in Biology in 2023 - Quanta Magazine
articles.description: In a year packed with fascinating discoveries, biologists pushed the limits of synthetic life, probed how organisms keep time, and refined theories about consciousness and emotional health.
articles.content: Revolutions in the biological sciences can take many forms. Sometimes they erupt from the use of a novel tool or the invention of a radical theory that suddenly opens so many new avenues for research… [+3382 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft confirms Windows 11 Wi-Fi issues, asks for user feedback - BleepingComputer
